sentences.en: And this is Margot. She also part of your team.
sentences.cn: 这是玛戈特, 她也是你们组的一员.

sentences.en: At the end of the year we were both in tears as we said a heartbreaking farewell, because I'd been accepted at the Jewish Lyceum, where Margot also went to school.
sentences.cn: 六年级结束的时候，我和科普卢斯夫人都流下了离别的眼泪，因为我被犹太公立中学录取了，而玛戈特也在那里读中学。

sentences.en: Hello, Margot. The pleasure's all mine.
sentences.cn: 你好.玛戈特. 这都是我的荣幸.

sentences.en: In most news reports the name Margot Bracken figured prominently.
sentences.cn: 大部分新闻报导突出地提到马戈特·布雷肯的名字.

sentences.en: Margot are you thinking of marrying Jim?
sentences.cn: 玛戈特,你打算和吉姆结婚 吗 ?

sentences.en: Margot: What should I do now?
sentences.cn: 玛戈特: 我现在该怎麽办?

sentences.en: Meanwhile, as NPR's Margot Adler reports, police on high alert.
sentences.cn: 同时, 据NPR的玛戈·阿德勒报道, 警方保持高度警戒.

sentences.en: My sister Margot was born in Frankfurt am Main in Germany in 1926.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐玛戈特1926年出生在德国美因河畔的法兰克福。

sentences.en: The ballerina, Margot Fonteyn, bought a suit.
sentences.cn: 该芭蕾, margot方廷, 买了西装.

sentences.en: Though Margot was curious, she sensed it was not a time further questions.
sentences.cn: 马戈特很想再打听些情况, 但她意识到此时不宜多问.
